Summary: almost sqware silver nickal size of small fridgerator
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on the steps at my friends basement i was looking up at the stars and for some reason it stood out it caught my eye in a very astonishing way i new right of the bat it didnt belong there because it was to big. like i said it was about the size of a fridgerator and i was dam nere under neith it well about 30 feet from it i started comparing it to the other transisters and cable boxs to refrance it thats when i noticed that this object was hovering or ballanced itself on two teliphone lines that were about four feet from eachother it seemed to be making contact with the lines i said to my self man what the hell is it because of its size it should be waying those lines down it didnt make a sound but it felt like an electricity was like in the air not that you could see electricity but you could feel it and it didnt feel good almost like when you turn your tv on that ringing kind of noise but amplified times ten ever body was sleeping in the whole nieghborhood and i didnt want to tell my friends or my wife or my kids i dont want them to think that im weird so i havnt told any one about this.ill tell you how i felt about it at first shock because of its size then mezmerized then scared because how it made me feel i didnt feel good the more i stared at it the more i didnt want to look at it but because i new it was there i was intreegued buy it i never seen somthing that i didnt now what it was besides i had the feeling that it new it was being watcthed and that scared me i looked at it for about a hour and told my self remember the little box next to it that was about a foot away from it.i didnt take a picture of it cause i was scared to and plus i was bussy trying to hide from it so i went in laid down couldnt get to sleep tried to watch tv at about four thirty am kicked my fear steped out side and it was gone the big sqaure silver cube thing that was next to the little box was gone and to my surprise i looked up and there was a huge patch in the sky that looked like the northern lights and i did manage to take three pictures of it this was in july 2009 i think the goverment nows but is not saying for the worlds safty that was a life changing experience ill always look up at the stars i am puerto rican korean and thats my testomony.
